params._admin: admin address capable of setting URI
params._personalBundlerImplementation: - deployed master copy of the personal bundler contract

createPersonalBundler(address).details: clones a new personal bundler contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

requestTransferOwnership(address).details: Requests transferring ownership of the contract to a new account (`_newOwnerCandidate`). Can only be called by the current owner.
